LanguageData.NeedThroneAssignedDesc: One of your people has a royal title that requires a throneroom, but no throneroom is assigned.\n\nBuild a throne in a room, then assign the throne to the title holder. The throneroom should be appropriately sized and decorated to satisfy the title's specific requirements.
LanguageData.UndignifiedBedroomDesc: One of your people has a royal title that requires a bedroom with specific features. Either no bedroom is assigned, or the assigned bedroom doesn't satisfy the requirements.
LanguageData.NeedBedroomAssignedDesc: One of your people has a royal title that requires a personal bedroom, but no bedroom is assigned.\n\nAssign them a personal bedroom. The bedroom should be appropriately sized and decorated to satisfy the title's specific requirements.
LanguageData.UndignifiedThroneroomDesc: One of your people has a royal title and a throne, but the throne room does not satisfy the title's requirements.
LanguageData.RoyalNoAcceptableFoodDesc: One of your people has a royal title with specific food requirements. But there's no food available that satisfies these requirements.
LanguageData.ThroneroomInvalidConfigurationDesc: A throne is not usable because of how it is set up:
LanguageData.MonumentMarkerMissingBlueprintsDesc: The monument won't be completed because blueprints have not been placed for all its parts.\n\nSelect the monument marker and click "Place blueprints", or place the blueprints manually.
